122.content:
Option 1- Becky was the average anthro in this world, eating humans whenever she got the chance to, while keeping her job as a landlord for the apartment building she owned.

Option 2- Suzy was a freak science experiment gone wrong whenever the government mixed her dna with a Gator and turned her into the ten foot tall invincible monster she is today. She lives in the bayou, but is just starting her unkillable revenge by eating any human who crosses her.
122.title: Crocodile

1222.content:
You look down at your naked scaly body in disgust and anger at what they did to you. Humans were a cruel set of people, turning on their win after they look a little different. That doesn't matter now though, after they attacked you unsuccessfully they had outcast you from their kind. You were the only one of your kind. You were Suzy, the invincible anthro alligator, and you were out for revenge.

Climbing out of the muddy swamp you looked at the sun as it slowly rose from behind the horizon. You look in the distance at a small house on the swamp, a pickup truck parked out back and a man drunkenly arguing with his crying wife. You lick your lips in anticipation as you creep up towards the door. You kick open the door and hear them both scream as they flee to separate rooms.

You follow the man as he runs to the bathroom and picks up a 12 gauge shotgun, aiming it at your face and pumping you full of lead. You can only laugh as the bullets bounce off your grinning teeth and he realizes his fate as your meal. You pick the man up by hid chest and kiss him before opening your lips and placing him on your tongue. You give a gulp before moving to the bedroom to find his crying wife behind the bed.

She screams as you come closer to her and rip off her clothes with your teeth. She cries harder as you lick your lips which you wrap around her squirming body and shove her into your jaw before sending her down to reunite with her husband. You burp off the two before you
1222.title: Suzy the Outcast Anthro

13.content: Are you a boy or girl?
13.title: human

131.content:
You have 2 options.

You can be Andrew, a gargantuan 6'4 200 guy. Going down this path will involve plenty of involvement with vore; Andrew runs experiments quite a lot, knows the ins and outs of the art, and also "helps" the girls with their own experiments, although plenty of times does not actually volunteer to do this. Despite being so big, Andrew is actually very bad at defending against vore attacks from other girls. This is because Andrew will more often than not actually refuse to hit a girl, and this leads to them overpowering Andrew quite easily. Thankfully, Andrew does not carry this policy over to other guys. This is where Andrew's massive frame comes into full effect, as no guy in the school can claim to be as good at this particular subject as Andrew is, and as such, no guy will ever defeat Andrew 1 on 1.

Your other option is Carl. Carl is much smaller, clocking in at 5'5 120. Carl is unfortunately too small to make very much use of his undeveloped vore power, and often finds himself on the menu for the class' girls. Carl knows a lot about vore, but unfortunately has an undeveloped power as a whole thanks to his inability to actually use most of what he has learned.

Who do you want to go with?
131.title: Boy
